Package lib.controller

Class LibraryController

java.lang.Object
lib.controller.LibraryController
public class LibraryController extends Object
The controller for library functions. Services the LibraryView.

      Parameters:
      id -

      public static void deleteBookCopyById(String id)

    • listCopies

      public static List<Copy> listCopies()
      Returns a list of all copies of books in the library. Note that this should return *Copies*, not books.
      Returns:

    • generateCheckoutBookList

      public static List<Loan> generateCheckoutBookList(Integer userId)
      Returns all outstanding checked out books by the user_id. If user_id is null, returns all checked out books. Used to generate library reports for loaned books as well as user reports of their own borrowed books.
      Parameters:
      userId -
      Returns:

    • getBookById

      Looks up a book by id. A useful helper method.
      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • checkIfCopyHasLoan

      public static Loan checkIfCopyHasLoan(int idNum)
      Checks to see if a copy of a book is available, i.e. there are no current Loans for that book. If there is one, returns a Loan so that the user can be made aware of when the book will be returned. Returning null means that the book is available.
      Parameters:
      copyId -
      Returns:

    • checkIfCopyHasLoan

      public static Loan checkIfCopyHasLoan(String copyID)

    • checkoutBook

      public static void checkoutBook(int cId, User user)
      Checks a copy of a book out to the specified user. Creates a loan for that copy and marks the date. Let's say that all book loans are for two weeks.
      Parameters:
      copyId -

    • checkoutBook

      public static void checkoutBook(String copyId, User user)

    • depositBook

      public static void depositBook(int cId, User user)
      Deposits a book back in the library. Should mark the corresponding loan as inactive, if an active loan exists for that copy, for this user.
      Parameters:
      copyId -

    • depositBook

      public static void depositBook(String copyId, User user)
